product_name: Organic India Classic Tulsi Green Tea, 100 g: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_title: Price change everytime. 230,180,190. Company do wrong job they not make customers happy.
reviews.review_body: Product price change at any time you seeThey show some time : 230+ delivery charges190+ delivery charges.If you maintain your customers than be perfect and genuine.This is sad review from side to this .But its cleary observed my self.

reviews.review_title: The best medicine to reduce weight, fighting flu and great taste with leaves in it.
reviews.review_body: I tried lot of other brands like Tetley, liptop, typhoo green-teas I used to get too much burps.  When I had this Greentea for the first time I saw being very healthy and energetic no burps for long, reduced tummy, when ur sick fights the flu. People might be thinking I'm simply saying here these. I'm honestly saying this is the best medicinal and great taste green-tea. Great taste I say because I have experience of eating natural mint leaves. I would suggest people to try this than going to other brands like lipton and others.
Not as expected. Percentage of tulsi is higher  so, taste is not of tea but it is taste like tulsi.

After 9 month of manufacturing in organic india green tea having no use to consume..........,üêõüêõüêõüêõwhite wale  Keede pad gye.........but expiry date in jan 2021.........waste tea....Lipton is best option

One of the best green teas' available in the market. The tulsi flavor differentiates it from other green teas. Green tea haters should try this once. Has lots of advantages. Refreshes you and boosts metabolism. For rest of the benefits, please check the box. Have without sugar for best results. Try it twice a day for a week and you will get used to it. Best time to have it is an hour after breakfast and lunch.

Great product..i have been using it from past 4 years....i take it in morning with lemon and honey..Its good for weight management also..nd very refreshing.... so overall very good product....taste is not that good but you will be used to it after some time.

I throw It away As soon as I drink only one cup. I will never Buy from this company again. I am a regular Green tea Drinker. I have tried tetley,Typhoo,Ripple,Lipton,teamonk I never felt like I am drinking anythig bad. But this is the worst product I ever tried. I threw It away After My First Cup. Very Bad.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful aroma and taste ! Value for money
reviews.review_body: Beautiful aroma and the taste is very refreshing. Just perfect. U feel wonderful, just opening the tea jar itself.It's the best Tulsi green tea I have tried so far.And value for money too. I bought mine 2 months back, 2 cups of green tea a day , yet a lot is left.
